title: LockInfoResponse
description: This structure is used to return the lock information for a vAMP position.

amount.description: The amount of ampLP locked in the position

coefficient.description: This is the initial boost for the lock position

end.description: End time for the vAMP position decay

slope.description: Slope at which a staker's vAMP balance decreases over time

start.description: Start time for the vAMP position decay

voting_power.description: includes only decreasing voting_power, it is the current voting power of the period currently queried.

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
